Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.commands

package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.commands
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui
     
  • Class
    Description
    AuthenticateCommand
    This command allows players to authenticate with the server, entering a nickname.
    ChangeFocusedPlayerCommand
    This command allows players to change the play area displayed in the scene PlayAreaScene.
    ConnectCommand
    This command allows to connect to the server by entering network params (protocol, hostname and port).
    CreateGameCommand
    This command allows players to create a game.
    DrawCardCommand
    This command allows to draw a card from a DrawSource.
    ExitFinishedGameCommand
    This command allows players to leave the EndingScene and turn back to the GamesListScene.
    JoinCommand
    This command allows players to join a game.
    PlaceCardCommand
    This command allows players to place a card.
    QuitCommand
    This command allows players to quit the application.
    ResumeGameCommand
    This command allows players to resume a game (RESTORING status).
    SelectColorCommand
    This command allows players to select color in SelectColorScene.
    SelectObjectiveCommand
    This command allows players to select secret objective in SelectObjectiveScene.
    SelectObjectiveCommand.SecretObjectiveChoice
    This enum represents all available player's choices during SETUP_OBJECTIVE status.
    SelectStartingCardSideCommand
    This command allows players to select the starting card side in SelectStartingCardSideScene.
    SendMessageCommand
    This command allows players to send messages during games.
    SetBoardVisibilityCommand
    This command allows players to show/hide the board on PlayAreaScene.
    SetChatVisibilityCommand
    This command allows players to show/hide the game's chat.
    SetManualVisibilityCommand
    This command allows players to show/hide the application's manual.
    SetObjectivesVisibilityCommand
    This command allows players to show/hide the objectives' box on PlayAreaScene.
    SetVisibleCardSideCommand
    This method allows players to flip the cards on hand on PlayAreaScene.
    StartGameCommand
    This command allows players to start a game before reaching the maximum capacity of the game.
    TuiCommand
    This class represents a generic Tui command.
